name: CLOUD JELLY Plumping Hydration Serum
about: What it is:A non-sticky serum formulated with Tremella mushroom u2014a hyaluronic acid alternative u2014that leaves skin feeling intensely hydrated, soft, and visibly plump..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:- Tremella Mushroom: An ingredient known as nature's alternative to hyaluronic acid that provides intensive hydration..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Natureu2019s super moisturizer, Tremella Mushroom, can hold up to 500 times its weight in water and is scientifically proven to retain moisture better than topical hyaluronic acid. The formula is lightweight, not sticky, PEG-free, and silicone-free and has a natural scent of floral and fruit..Clinical Results:In a Blind Use Test on 35 women and men, ages 28-35 years, study participants reported the following results after 1 week of twice-daily use:
ingredients: -Tremella Mushroom: An ingredient known as nature's alternative to hyaluronic acid that provides intensive hydration. .-Vegan Collagen: Moisturizes and nourishes skin.  .-Strawberry Extract: Rich in antioxidants (including vitamin C) that visibly brighten skin...Aqua/Water/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch Hydroxyethyl Ether, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Vegetable Collagen, Fragaria Vesca (Strawberry) Fruit Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa (Hibiscus) Flower Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Sodium Phytate, Cellulose Gum Gluconolactone, Glyceryl Caprylate, Arginine, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Eclipta Prostrata (False Daisy) Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera (Moringa) Seed Oil...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to damp skin after cleansing..-Follow with an oil or moisturizer to seal in hydration..-Can be mixed with oils for a customized, one-step moisture routine..-Use AM and PM...Recycling Instructions:.Place outer carton into paper recycling..Clean the pipette with warm water then gently remove it from the dropper by pulling downward, and recycle. Next, remove the soft bulb and discard it in the trash, but recycle the plastic collar. .Remove the label, rinse the glass bottle thoroughly, and recycle.

reviews.review_title: Loving the hydration and doesn't flare up my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've officially used my first entire bottle, I can honestly say that my skin hasn't looked better. I have very sensitive skin, so sometimes I try out something new, and I have horrible reactions and need time to calm my skin back down. Luckily, this has been wonderful! I chose late last year to get back into a good skin routine, so I started with this serum and the Pink Cloud cleanser. In the fall, I noticed this serum was enough most days as my main moisturizer for day, but now that it's winter, I'm using some additional products since I have naturally very dry and sensitive skin. This makes my skin feel soft, plump, and dewy, without feeling tacky. I already bought my second bottle to keep up my routine. If you have dry and sensitive skin, I highly recommend giving this product a chance.

reviews.review_title: better in summer than winter for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally purchased this product in winter, when my skin is drier and sucks in moisture like a sponge. I used it for two weeks and didn't really notice a difference so I stopped using it for several months. Last month I ran out of a different hydrating serum and decided to use up the Cloud Jelly before I spent more money - turns out I LOVE IT in the summer! My skin has different hydration needs in the warmer months so this is a really great solution during that timeframe. I also use Nova in the morning and Moon Fruit at night, and I don't have any layering issues so I think Cloud Jelly is here to stay in my summer routine.

I also like to use it to thin out the texture of my sunscreen and make the formula a little more hydrating! Itu2019s not a necessity, but I sure do love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this serum for 5 months and Iu2019ve almost finished the bottle, Iu2019ve probably got a few more months of use if I had to guess. It dries down pretty fast so itu2019s not just sitting on top of your skin for minutes on end, the texture is pretty nice, and I love the cute pastel pink color. Iu2019m honestly surprised Iu2019ve made this little bottle last so long but you really donu2019t need a lot to cover your face. A little goes a long way! I also enjoy that it doesnu2019t overly hydrate my skin since Iu2019m oily/combo and too much moisturizer makes me look wet after an hour lol. I can comfortably not wear makeup with this and it gives me a plump, glassy skin look. u2728

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for over a month, almost always following Herb.'s Bakuchiol (sometimes after a gentle exfoliating treatment).  I have chemical allergies-- many other products cause skin irritations, trigger asthma and/or migraine; this one is problem-free.  Also noticeably, REMARKABLY hygroscopic!  I use it every night, and sometimes won't even top with a moisturizer; my face is always hydrated in the morning (previously, always dry).    After applying, before I fall asleep, it can become a bit sticky to the touch, but that just reminds me not to touch my face.  This product attracts ambient humidity like nothing I've worn before.    Following the most stressful 3 months of my life (while wearing an N95 all day everyday):  the dehydration/ fine lines around my mouth are becoming less apparent; my healthy pores look smaller; clogged pores are diminishing...    I don't write many reviews, but Herbivore's Bakuchiol is really good, and I'm AMAZED by the hydration from Cloud Jelly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this Serum. Though it is not a need it does make your skin feel so plump the morning after. Some reviews on here complain about pilling, but the trick is not to use it with other oil based products. Stick with all water based products. Will definitely purchase again even if it's more of a luxury than a need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in a set with the Bakuchiol full size. This is so far, a wonderful product. My skin feels so firm and looks plumped up when I use it. I switched from using Lancome for many years and am now using all Herbivore. I'm 58, and my skin has improved so much. I'm in love with Herbivore products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I try to be really fair and honest in these reviews so other people like me can get accurate information BEFORE purchasing. Iu2019ve tried lots of hyaluronic acid serums, plumping serums etc and this one isnu2019t bad. For me it works well, hydrates, not oily, no real smell to it, and it does in fact plump the skin. However, Iu2019ve been using it for a month (I give all the products I try 30 consecutive days) to see if there is benefit and the answer is yes. This will hydrate your skin and make it soft plump and so on. It is however a very small amount for the price and using it AM and PM as recommended it barely lasted me the full 30 days. Iu2019m not fully sold on this because I feel there are other products that produce just as well results if not BETTER, for less money and more product. A good example is the jumbo plum plump from glow recipe. So for me it wonu2019t be a repurchase because I feel there are others that do better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have mature skin and love how this provides extra moisture. It does take getting used to the consistency but just make sure to let it settle for a minute and then add your cream. Their cloud cream goes perfect with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Well I was looking forward to trying this line. And with all the positive reviews.  So I bought the serum and the moisturizer.  Once I put it on and just after a few min my eyes started to water and I got the worst headache.  I thought I would ask the company if they could recommend one of the products without any scent.  All I got was an email with them beating around the bush and would not even answer the simple question.  The cream was the same as well. I did not see any listing for fragrance so  that is why I gave it a try.  Terrible customer service.   I will never buy from this line again.  Just a simple question so itu2019s a simple answer.  Not impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this, but it's more of an indulgence. It adds that really nice extra boost of hydration before my cream. I use it with my Avene thermal water spray and it just sinks right into my skin with a trace. Which is great because I prefer using multiple lighter, quick absorbing moisturizing products in the morning so I can get out of the door quickly. It also doesn't irritate my dry, sensitive skin or have much of a scent. I don't feel it plumps up my skin, but it moisturizes and my skin is soft after application. Asethically, it has a really fun liquid jelly like texture and I like that its pink. I'm giving it 4 stars because it does exactly what it says it will and it suits my needs better than other hyaluronic acids I've tried (absorbs faster and better than other hyaluronic acids I've tried and it has a nice texture), but it's expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't think this would do much, but I bought it because they marketed it very well and it smells amazing. However, to my surprise, this serum makes my normal-dry skin (dry skin in the winter) bouncy, plump, and hydrated for the whole day. My skin looks noticeably less tired, even with less than 6 hours of sleep. I'm in my early 20s, so I don't have many wrinkles to handle, but I do have issues with dullness and some under-eye shadowing. I use this on my whole face and started to use it under my eyes too...and it instantly plumps/awakens the under eye area too!

reviews.review_title: Before you give up, read this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to address a common theme I read in the previous comments about this serum drying out your skin. Just as in traditional hyaluronic acid serums, this MUST be applied to DAMP skin, and then, because this vegan hyaluronic acid alternative works even better at drawing moisture into the skin, I found I need to spray my face with water to dampen again after application. If you apply this serum in this manner, I promise you, you will be amazed with the way it plumps your skin, smoothing fine lines and alleviating dryness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me first preface, my favorite plumping serum is Genifique by Lancu00f4me. However, since that brand isnu2019t Clean at Sephora, I am always on the hunt for a good alternative. I want something that helps reduce the lines on my forehead, fills out texture on my cheeks and visibly keeps me hydrated underneath makeup all day. This product initially did those things. Where I started to wane on my instant love of the Cloud Jelly, was in the overall timeline of the product.   Collagen is best absorbed internally. It can sit on the surface of your skin but without adequate ways to keep the product penetrating into the surface, it will just evaporate. This product did not last a full 12 hours under a full face of makeup. I have tried it without makeup, and it doesnu2019t withstand a full day this way either. I think itu2019s a great immediate-gratification, surface-level skincare product. Would I purchase again? If I wanted something that would help hydrate my skin and physically reduce texture for about 5 hours? Yes. Otherwise the hunt continues for something better. The price point did not yield the promise I wanted it to.

reviews.review_text: This is a great product!! After two days of using it my dark spots have definitely reduced in pigmentation. I have very dry skin and this is so perfect! I just layer a light moisturizer on top :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the consistency and definitely hydrated my skin but I was done with it within weeks. Like it only lasted a month. For the price I was expecting a little bit longer lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product initially left my skin feeling smooth. I have been using it for about 3 weeks but it seems as if the product thinned out and is not working as well. I would not repurchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this serum. My bottle of hyaluronic acid ran out from Good Molecules (which I love as well) and I saw this had just launched, so I wanted to try it out. My bottle is almost out and I will DEFINITELY be repurchasing. The price is a little up there, but itu2019s something Iu2019m willing to pay because I have noticed a difference in my skin: more plump and hydrated, morning and night! I would definitely recommend applying to a damp face, and my 3 drops apply like a dream! You wonu2019t believe the difference itu2019ll make (in your entire skincare routine!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't get it - I usually like Herbivore's stuff but this just doesn't hit. I feel like I have to apply 5 droppers just to get properly hydrated. Bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s an okay serum for the daytime. I wouldnu2019t go so far as to say itu2019s great or really anything special. Itu2019s not hydrating than other serums, and I prefer my Vichy mineral 89 to this. Iu2019ll use the whole bottle of this serum, but I wonu2019t repurchase. if you have nothing else and have the money to throw at this, go for it, otherwise Iu2019d pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this serum! I have sensitive acne-prone skin and this has been great! The scent is VERY subtle, which I love.  I use 3 drops for my whole face and thatu2019s plenty. I find it very hydrating and my skin feels soft after using it. The quality is worth the price. Safe and clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Eeek not good for dry skin!! Dries super matte while still sticky and accentuates fine lines. Feels chalky yuck yuck yuck

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on a whim and itu2019s absolutely amazing. Felt like I was on a dead end with my skin. looked dull and dry and this is sooo hydrating and glowy. Iu2019ve spent so much money on serums and products trying to get glowy and nothing worked, or it looked glowy but sat on my skin and looked weird. Definitely does exactly what it says it will do. I think itu2019s comparable to glow recipe plump plum serum, I use to love that but this 100% will be my new go to serum and Iu2019ll continue to repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a clean, refreshing serum. It doesn't leave my skin feeling sticky after application, and I find it super plumping! It's not as hydrating as I thought it was going to be so definitely stick with your moisturizer as well with this serum... but give it a try it makes you feel so fresh!

reviews.review_title: a little goes a longgggg way.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical of this at first. It was super tacky and pilled after applying my moisturizer. Then I decided to read some reviews and the bottle again, lol, and it says 2-3 drops. A little goes a long way. I think I was using almost a full dropped. The next day my skin was plump, soft and hydrated. Probably wonu2019t purchase again but Iu2019m enjoying it. Weu2019ll see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this but havent been using long enough to give full disclosure.  I like the ingredients and that it is thin and absorbs quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does not feel oily. I live in a high desert, dry climate. I was looking for products that do not have Hyaluronic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. Feels silky going on, was a little tacky until it sunk in but left my skin feeling nourished. I was able to layer moisturizer and foundation over top without pilling.

reviews.review_title: light hydrator and great for layering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is light and easily absorbs for a nice and LIGHT hydrating layer.  Really like it!  Obviously you have to put a moisturizer on top.  I have combination but dehydrated skin so this is perfect for me.  I don't think it would be great for those with dry skin.  Expect to be using this serum for the summer without feeling sticky or thick, etc...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin had never been more hydrated since I started using this product. Not only that, but somehow my make up always looks so much better towards the end of the day than it ever has. My husband has also been testing it out with his very dry skin, and loves it. Can safely say that I wonu2019t be without this from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This doesnu2019t hydrate or plump... it dries out my skin more than before I put it on. It looks really promising when you first put it on, but it stays sticky forever and then once you endure the stickiness, it pills off in gross pieces and never fully sinks in. Once itu2019s on for a while it makes my skin feels like the Sahara desert. I was really excited to try a brand new product but itu2019s getting returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 3 days in, so far loving it. My skin looks plump and hydrated! I have sensitive, acne prone dry skin and my face is loving this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I reallly wanted to love this but I found it didn't really do much except maybe brighten my skin a little bit and the packaging is cute. It felt a little sticky going onto my face as well. When I paired it with a the herbivore orchid face oil it was a little better but not anything special. Will be returning it unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so disappointed in this purchase. It feels fantastic going on, very silky and not sticky at all. I havenu2019t noticed any plumping or even added moisture to my skin. Itu2019s been more of a primer to my moisturizer...but my skin looks no different at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best hydration serums Iu2019ve ever tried. I have oily sensitive skin and I am very impressed by this product because it provides long lasting hydration without irritating my skin. I also love the consistency, light scent and how quickly it absorbs without leaving a sticky feeling. A real gem!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves the Cloud Jelly. What gorgeous packaging your line has created. I love the rainbow colours of oils and serums but most importantly they work and have great ingredients.  This one is now on my favourites list and will continue to add this to my routine.  Non-sticky and keeps you hydrated all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The serum was nice and light and the packaging is simple and beautiful. I liked applying it better at night. It felt a little sticky when I applied it in the morning and then applied makeup. It is refreshing and hydrating and nice addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum is very lightweight and my skin drinks it up pretty quickly, so there is not any annoying feeling of a product sitting on my skin. It is a little bit tacky, but not too much, so it feels pretty good on my skin. I like how It smells (like a candy). I havenu2019t been using it for a long time, so canu2019t comment on its long term effects, but when I swatched it on back of the hand and compared it to clean one, the hand with serum had visibly less texture and looked more supple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! It really does feel like a cloud on your skin. It makes my skin look so youthful and plumped! I love the texture so much. One of the best products from the brand in my opinion! Love everything from the Cloud line though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a long time lover of all herbivore products and this one isnu2019t the exception to the rule. I love the new cloud jelly. It has the lightest strawberry scent and feels great on your skin. Itu2019s definitely a great purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore gifted me their Cloud Jelly and its been a really nice addition to my routine. Ive been using it for a few weekend and honestly love love how easy it is too apply. Not too thick, quickly sinks into the skin and does not leave a film. Its enough added hydration to pair with a nice moisturizer and it just leaves my skin super plump. I can definitely see all skin types using this. Herbivore is known for their super chic packaging and honestly this did not disappoint. The glass bottle just makes me feel super luxe. Excite to continue using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have absolutely been loving this product!! Itu2019s a great option for those of us that hate heavy and/or sticky products with these hotter months coming up! Itu2019s water based so it absorbs beautifully morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been a longtime fan of this brand, so I was really excited when Herbivore Botanicals gifted me their new Cloud Jelly serum to try. I have been using this in my AM & PM routine and Iu2019m really loving it. I have dry skin, and this serum is really moisturizing. Has a jelly like texture, and leaves a slightly tacky finish on me, but I donu2019t mind it since I apply moisturizer afterward, and then my skin doesnu2019t feel sticky anymore. I donu2019t notice a scent, but I know scent can be subjective so that may now be the case for everyone. I especially love using this in my daytime routine because it leave my skin looking glowy and bouncy. I think this is gonna be a new staple in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice hydrating serum! First of all, I really like the glass dropper packaging, it's beautiful, easy to use, and shows off the pretty pink color of the product. The serum itself is nice too. It's not too heavy nor too light. It's very hydrating and not tacky. I really enjoy using this and they way it feels on my skin. I just think it's a bit too expensive for a hydrating serum. Disclaimer: I recieved this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far this serum has been heavy in rotation in my routine! I recently received this serum, after much anticipation to try it out. I was a bit weary because anything with the words u201cjellyu201d on a packaging, I tend to avoid. I have dry skin & Iu2019ve noticed my skin will look really greasy when I use gel like products. This one however made my skin look dewy & plump after one application. I love pairing it with other serums that brighten my skin, for even more extra glow :D Itu2019s not sticky, evenly applies, & it feels pretty lightweight on the skin! Itu2019s also pretty hydrating on the skin as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The serum is amazing. My dry skin loves the hydration it provides along with the softness and plumpness. The serum absorbs quickly and is non-sticky. Few drops go the long way and it easily layers with other skincare products.  Its a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a really nice texture! It is not too slimy,  easy to spread, absorbs instantly into my skin. But it also dries down quickly, not too hydrating but itu2019s good to pair with other serums. It doesnu2019t have a strong scent at all, and the pink color is really nice to looking at ;) it is such a cute pretty bottle on my vanity!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried a few product from this brand that Iu2019ve really liked, but this serum doesnu2019t really do it for me. I love the packaging and the texture of the serum, but it didnu2019t add much to my routine. I expected it to hydrate and plump my skin, but it just makes my face feel dry and tight. Perhaps this is best suited for someone with oily skin instead of my very dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore kindly gifted me their cloud jelly. I've been using for a few weeks in the morning. First impressions, the product is soft and makes my skin feel smooth.  I love the applicator,  one dose in the applicator is enough for my entire face. I do apply a good amount of SPF after for added hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely love this product! I thought I wouldnu2019t like it first because it looks very u201cdesign-yu201d and gives me all beautiful look but doesnu2019t work. iu2019ve been using it for 5 days now and I can see that my skin is becoming youthful. my skin is very supple and my face started to get softer and smoother. my spots are getting less pigmented. i am happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin had been feeling super dry so I was excited to try this! I could definitely tell a difference in my skin after using it. Like it literally was glowing and looked a lot plumper. Bonus that it comes in such cute packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum absorbs very nicely into my skin and gives me a nice glow. Also makes my face feel very plump. I do feel a bit of tackiness when I wear this over a heavier toner or essence. Love the packaging and the color of the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so much for gifting me this product to try! Its my first time using this brand. I would love to try the other products too. The strawberry cloud jelly has been working for me very well. I apply it at night after my shower. The packaging was super cute and sweet. It smells great and there's I no residue! Doesn't feel sticky at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a day serum that would hydrate well, make my skin glow and not rub off when I apply a bit of makeup like I've seen other serums do. I did a bit of research and decided to give this one a try. It did not disappoint. I love the bottle ; not only is it gorgeous, it lets me dispense the exact amount I need. I use this every morning and I don't even feel like I need a moisturizer on top of it! Will definitely be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this new Herbivore Cloud Jelly Serum! I have a dry skin so a hydrating serum is a must in my routine. This serum is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and doesnu2019t feel sticky at all. The texture is so lovely on the skin too! It has amazing skin loving ingredients like Tremella Mushroom that is known to absorb better than Hyaluronic Acid, and Strawberry Extract.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of Herbivore for years, so I was so excited to try Cloud Jelly.  It did not disappoint, I have been using this product morning and night for about a month now and my skin feels hydrated and supple.  I noticed my skin is soft and brighter after use with no sticky residue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so good! I love the smooth texture and Iu2019m happy it doesnu2019t have too much fragrance. I really like the packaging and overall I love this brand and this product. Itu2019s a serum but it feels so moisturizing and nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had the best experience with this serum! Iu2019ve tried many herbivore products in the past and have enjoyed them all but I was really pleasantly surprised with this one! I have very sensitive skin and this serum sunk right in with no irritation and left my skin glowy and plump! Love the tremella and strawberry extracts!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product in exchange for my honest opinion. This serum is so delightful. It smells incredible and has a lightweight hydrating texture. I love how soft and glowy my skin looks when I apply this!! It provides lasting hydration. Plus the bottle is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this! It has a nice, lightweight texture and a subtle fruity/rose scent. I don't know if it's life-changing, but I feel like it adds some extra moisture applied as a serum underneath my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item complimentary from Herbivore. I was really excited to try this out especially since I love other products from herbivore. The texture of this product is like light jelly, a little runny, and doesnu2019t leave your face feeling too sticky. I donu2019t think it leaves my skin feeling as moisturized as other hyaluronic serums Iu2019ve tried - but if youu2019re on the oilier side you might like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum feels light on the skin, but definitely isn't light on hydration. I have super dry skin and it has been loving the moisture boost it gets when I apply this. This serum has a thin jelly texture that is easy to apply and absorbs nicely with no pilling. It also layers well with any other products I've used it with and wears well under makeup. I really like that it not only hydrates my skin, but gives it an antioxidant boost too and is a great addition to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, dehydrated skin and really enjoy the texture of this hydrating serum. I've never used a product with tremella mushroom before, and I must say that i'm impressed! It is very hydrating and absorbs quickly into my skin. It leaves a slight sticky finish upon application but disappears within a minute. I think it is a little expensive for what it is, but I like that it comes in glass packaging and isn't scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful hydrating serum that leaves the skin bouncy, plump and dewy. It has a subtle strawberry scent and a slightly tacky finish that doesn't bother me at all, because I always layer a moisturizer on top of it anyway. It does play well with other serums, creams and SPF without any pilling and it was a lovely addition to my routine. I am so excited to try more from Herbivore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First let's talk about the packaging; so stinking adorable! I am a sucker for cute packaging, and the product is a light baby pink which is adorable. I have noticed a different in the overall hydration of my skin, but that's all. It isn't going to provide you with incredible anti aging benefits, but it will give you nice and hydrated skin. I was sent this product complimentary in return for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous product. From the packaging to the smell to the texture. Itu2019s truly such a joy to use. It has a very very subtle strawberry scent that I didnu2019t even notice until I tried to smell it. When you apply, it goes on smooth and leaves your skin looking beautiful. It does dry down a bit tacky and tight, but once a moisturizer is over it, everything is perfect. This is not meant to be used without a moisturizer so I wouldnu2019t knock it for the sticky factor. I do think itu2019s hydrating my skin and I love using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has a medium viscosity and applies very smooth on the skin. It is fragrance free and there is no noticeable scent, which I love! It contains a lot of great fruit extracts and gives a really nice glow to the skin.

reviews.review_title: If you have dry skin you should definitely try it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, I mix it with my moisturizer and it sits great with my make up. Not mixed it was a little weird with my make up. It really makes my skin feel hydrated and plump and glowy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is an absolute joy to use- it is quite hydrating, absorbs effortlessly into the skin, and has a non-sticky finish. I have quite dry skin and this serum keeps it looking and feeling its best- hydrated, healthy, and nourished. I love that this serum leaves my skin feeling soft and plump. It has quickly made itself right at home in my routines and is a product I find myself to looking forward to using every time. It also layers with the rest of the products in my routine beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beyond obsessed with this serum for my dry skin!  This has been helping keep my very dry skin in check!  I love the way it smells so delicate.  The packaging is beyond beautiful and luxurious!  The texture is silky soft and absorbs into my skin quickly.  I have sensitive skin and I didnu2019t have any bad reactions with this!  Definitely plan to repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a few weeks and I love the consistency & how supple and hydrated it makes my skin feel right after. I have super dry skin so itu2019s perfect!! Will definitely be buying more after I run out. I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite serum. Itu2019s lightweight and sinks into the skin instantly. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated! I have extremely sensitive skin and havenu2019t experienced any irritation at all so far. Plus, the packaging is adorable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED!!! This product is so hydrating and vegan collagen is making all of the difference in my skin right now. I have super dry skin normally but this serum is making my skin so hydrating, plump and noticeably softer and more even!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this serum is super cute and sturdy. I adore the pink color of this serum and the dropper applicator. I also LOVE how plush this serum feels as I rub it into my skin. That being said I donu2019t really recommend this serum....although it does hydrate it is so minimal. The glow and hydration is so minimal. Iu2019ve had more transformative results from serums that were retailed for less than half of the amount. At this price tag, this serum does not perform to the results Iu2019ve had from lower priced serums where they offered me much more hydration and glowy, supple skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very nice and hydrating. Iu2019ve loved other herbivore products so I was excited to try this one. It isnu2019t too heavy despite being a hydrating product, so itu2019ll be perfect for the summer heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! A few drops definitely go a long way. The scent is so light that itu2019s barely there. I have dry skin and itu2019s hard to find something that truly feels hydrating. This definitely does. I apply it at night and layer an oil on top of it. In the morning, my skin feels super soft and plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this product at The Grove and I'm running to the store to buy the full version. It's incredible hydrating and layered beautiful with my pm retinols/acids. Woke up with extremely hydrating skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum delivers an instant hydration when is applied, I'm impressed with how the skin feels and how the dry patches are gone right away. The smell is so yummy, have a slightly strawberry smell. Thank you Herbivore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was kindly gifted to be by Herbivore. I loved this product because it left my skin feeling hydrated and glowy. Itu2019s a new favorite serum that I will definitely be re buying once Iu2019ve used it all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It seriously makes my skin feel so incredibly soft! This is by far my favorite product by Herbivore. I truly feel my skin more plump and hydrated when I use this product and I feel like it gives me glowy hydration!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It has a jelly like texture and very hydrating. I have very dry skin and it gives me instant moisture and my skin looks really plump. It smells so nice  which isnu2019t overpowering. My skin is so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been loving this serum so much to add an extra boost of hydration to my skincare routine. I love that I look like I just stepped out of a facial after using this! It hassle nice scent as well, which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't tried Herbivore product before so I was really excited to try this one out! It also didn't really hydrate my skin as much as I would have liked. So, you won't see me running to Sephora to get this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for about 4 days and I see a difference when I use this, I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I've been enjoying this serum so much. First, the packaging is adorable and it is a clean, cruelty free brand. The serum leaves your skin feeling hydrated- it is more on the stickier side so your skin will feel a bit tacky.  There is a light and pleasant scent as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Herbivore products have always tempted me because theyu2019re so gorgeously packaged. I was drawn to this new product because hyaluronic acid is a crucial step in my skincare routine and Iu2019m always up for anything that will add a bounce in my skin. This comes as a pale pink gel texture in a dropper bottle. I use about 2 drops and pat it into my face after toner. My skin does actually look and feel more plump and bouncy after using this! There is a super faint sweet scent to it and it does leave my skin slightly tacky but itu2019s not bothersome at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Although the serum is on the pricier side, itu2019s definitely worth it, considering how little you need to use each time. I only need 3 drops for my whole face, whereas with other serums, I normally use 8 drops. This is definitely a holy grail for me. I recommend it to all skin types, even oily types because it doesnu2019t clog my pores.  *gifted in exchange for honest review

reviews.review_title: Plump and Hydrated Skin for the Win!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product truly transformed my skin from dry to soft and plump. I'm currently on Accutane, and it's been hard to find products that don't just sit on top of my face or sting. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this serum! It has a very light almost unnoticeable smell. My skin drinks this up and feels hydrated and soft! It absorbs so quickly and I love that it isnu2019t sticky. The

Plus, since herbivore doesnu2019t use synthetic preservatives in their products, Iu2019m worried this will go bad before Iu2019m able to finish using it. There are hydrating serums I like a lot better, but this one wasnu2019t bad- it just wasnu2019t the best one Iu2019ve tried.

This formula gives my skin an instant fresh glow and make it look so healthy! It really plumps out my creases and wrinkles for a smoother appearance. I just love how my skin feels fresh and elastic. It just has a healthy bounce to it. I highly recommend this serum. It has truly changed my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cloud jelly is a very nice hydrating serum, not sticky or tacky and sinks in quick and easy. My skin feels instantly plump and hydrated. This is a nice alternative to Hyaluronic Acid. Ive used Tremblay mushroom products before and really like them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate that Herbivore has released a serum based on an alternative to hyaluronic acid! Snow mushroom is an excellent substitute that also binds water, thereby acting as a humectant. This was a smart release given that some people struggle with hyaluronic acid based products, and yes - this is free of all forms of HA.  Like all of Herbivore's products, the texture is lovely - a bit thicker initially but absorbs rapidly into skin. The smell is light and natural, and it dissipates quickly. Skin feels hydrated and smooth after use, and the thicker nature of this product seems to leave skin also looking a bit more like glass skin. I will say this might be too much for oily skin types, but I think dry to normal will love the end result.  As per usual, I appreciate the glass bottle. Not only is it beautiful, but I appreciate that it is less damaging to our planet than plastic. The price is also extremely reasonable given how a little goes a long way and glass packaged, clean products tend to cost much more. Herbivore tends to be great at striking a fair balance, and I'd say they have yet another hit in this product!

reviews.review_title: BEST HYDRATING SERUM FOR DRY SKIN
reviews.review_text: This is the best serum for dry skin! Itu2019s so plumping and hydrating. Itu2019s really helped my dry and dehydrated skin. It leaves my skin looking glowy and dewy. 100% recommend, especially for dry skin like me.

reviews.review_text: This product is go hydrating. I love the clean glass packaging. The product made my skin so plump and hydrated. I loved this and would recommend this to all skin tyoes. Love the results. There was no irritation at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals.   ADORE this! The texture is perfect. Lightweight lush gel that spreads easily across the face. Absorbs quickly drying down to a soft smooth finish. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and looking plump and glowing! I found the scent to be very light and non-offensive. Layers well with no pilling. Hyaluronic acid can sometimes leave my dry skin feeling dryer, so I was super excited to see this Tremella mushroom alternative! Also gentle and perfect for sensitive skin. Appreciate the recyclable glass packaging too. Def recommend!

reviews.review_text: I recieved this serum complimentary from Herbivore Botanicals. I really loved the dew drop type of consistency this serum has. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item complimentary from Herbivore. This Herbivore CLOUD JELLY Plumping Hydration Serum is amazing at helping my dry, flaky face to feel moisturized all day long! A few drops on my face is all it takes. Once you apply it, it does have a bit of tackiness to it but that does disappear when it dries. It has a light floral scent to it which I absolutely love! The scent isnu2019t too overwhelming and does dissipate over time. This light pink serum is also great for dullness, and loss of elasticity. It also contains Tremella Mushrooms which holds up to 500 times its weight in water. Overall this serum is wonderful and I would definitely purchase it again in the future!
